value.title: 3 steps to do an IT Admin Takeover for Power BI and Office 365
value.excerpt: In this video, I revisit how to perform an IT Admin takeover for your tenant. This could just be a tenant that you did an individual sign up for Power BI with. value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
